author: Ed Kilgore
title: U.S. Supreme Court Slams Door on Wisconsin Vote-by-Mail for Mid-Pandemic Primary
description: A few hours after a Wisconsin court reinstated in-person voting, the conservative-majority U.S. Supreme Court halted an absentee voting extension.
content: Late Monday, the Wisconsin Supreme Court insisted on maintaining an in-person coronavirus-plagued primary (and for certain offices, general election) contest for Tuesday, April 7, despite a massive shortage of poll workers and a lot of voters rightly terrifie… [+4152 chars]
